import React, { useState } from 'react' import styles from './Modal.module.css' const Adduser = ({ setName}) => { const [input, setInput] = useState([ { name: "", Age: "", addrress: "", Phone: "", checked: false, }]); const onSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); } const inputHander = (e) => { const key = e.target.id; setInput({...input , [key] : e.target.value}); console.log(input); } return (
) } export default Adduser
